title: Trump Intel deal designed to block sale of chipmaking unit, CFO says
summary: US chipmaker has faced pressure to sell lossmaking foundry business struggling to compete with TSMC

title: Russian Deals Put Reliance Oil Core in Focus at Annual Jamboree
summary: Reliance Industries Ltd.’s annual investor gatherings have long been a red-letter day in the Indian financial calendar, with shareholders anticipating ambitious targets, bold statements and a rare sighting of a billionaire lauded for his business acumen.
